node.subtitle: Let me tell you a bit more about me
node.title: Hi! I’m Alexandra, SEO content writer and linguist

content.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"A year and a half I started to work as an SEO content writer at Siigo S.A.S and Falabella Colombia. During this period, I have managed to optimize, update, create, and edit written content of web platforms and to drive valuable organic traffic, understanding people’s search intent","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Web content and web positioning is a significant job for me as an SEO writer, which is why I worked in an independent way to improve my knowledge in this field.\n","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Besides, as a linguist, I understand the meaning of communicating and writing assertively and this motivated me to dive into digital marketing and content.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Currently, I am seeking professional accomplishments that challenge my bits of knowledge andcreativity as an SEO content writer.I hope to hearing from you soon","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
